## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed all console.log and debugging statements

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Test coverage meets minimum requirements (Backend: 80%, Frontend: 70%)

### Security

- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, passwords, etc.) included
- [ ] Security best practices followed
- [ ] Dependencies are up to date and have no known vulnerabilities

### CI/CD

- [ ] All CI/CD checks pass
- [ ] Pre-commit hooks pass
- [ ] Linting passes (Flake8, ESLint)
- [ ] Type checking passes (TypeScript)
- [ ] Security scans pass
